thread.title: Watch Guido Stazi pull off an impossible escape!
thread.title_full: Watch Guido Stazi pull off an impossible escape!

title: Watch Guido Stazi pull off an impossible escape!
text:
Witness the mayhem that was Simple Session 2017 
Coming from the latter school is Italy’s Guido Stazi . 
Hailing from a village ‘in the middle of nowhere’ with Milan the closest skate city, Guido is well travelled through skating and enjoys a good freak out when tricks refuse to come. WATCH THIS VIDEO We skated Colombia from Medellin to Cali – watch! 
Tyler Surrey, Zack Wallin, Thaynan Costa and Angelo Caro roll deep with the locals in coffee land. 
All these factors contribute to a surprising exit from this grind. Does he have to land on the grind with his back foot already reset? How do you bail? And what the actual?! 
#WTF
